title: Why my FPS is very unstable during the gaming after the client updating 2 months ago
body:
About 2 months， after the client updating, the gaming experience is very awful, the FPS is very unstable, it will constant change from FPS 60 to FPS 12, especially during group or being slaved, the ping is very low， below 30. And my Graphics is Nvidia GTX660， although it is not the newest series， it is good enough，i can use it for playing other video game, and i just updated the driver of Graphics last month, and i try to turn down the options of video, but it doesn't work and the only changed is the graphics became awful and the champions became so ugly.
Who can tell me is any way to solve this problem, and i wish official staff can give me any help

replies.body: Hmmmmm it almost sounds like you might need to check for some possible driver updates. Let's make sure to double check those, as well as going through the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Hit me back up if that doesn't seem to be helping, and remember to test those changes in a custom game with some bots!
